mapper.select: SELECT W_NO, EMP_NO, W_DATE, SUBSTR(START_TIME, 11, LENGTH(START_TIME)) START_TIME, SUBSTR(END_TIME, 11, LENGTH(END_TIME)) END_TIME FROM WORK WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND TO_CHAR(W_DATE, 'yy/MM/dd') = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'yy/MM/dd')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORK (W_NO, EMP_NO, W_DATE, START_TIME) VALUES ('W'||#{empNo}||'-'||TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyyMMdd'), #{empNo}, CURRENT_DATE, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'))
INSERT INTO WORK_STATUS_INFO VALUES ('S-'||SEQ_WORK_S_INFO.NEXTVAL, #{wNo}, #{sCode}, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.V_NAME, C.EMP_NAME, D.DEPT_TITLE FROM EMP_VACATION_REQ A JOIN VACATION B ON A.V_CODE = B.V_CODE JOIN EMPLOYEE C ON A.EMP_NO = C.EMP_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON C.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE WHERE A.EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY A.FIRST_DATE ASC
SELECT * FROM EMP_VACATION_OCC WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY OCCUR_NO ASC

SELECT A.*, B.*, C.DEPT_TITLE, D.JOB_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE A JOIN EMP_INFO B ON A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON A.DEPT_CODE = C.DEPT_CODE JOIN JOB D ON A.JOB_CODE = D.JOB_CODE WHERE A.EMP_NO = #{empNo}
